>

Because that's already Caitlyn's passive.

As I said in the last thread, all you need to do is make her gain focus faster. For example:

**Focus**
If Ashe has not attacked in the last 2 seconds, she gains 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 Focus stacks per second. At 100 stacks, Ashe will critically strike on her next basic attack. Thereafter, Focus stacks will reset to an amount equal to her critical strike chance.

Do this and her DPS is still lower while holding her fire to gain Focus stacks (it takes 6 seconds to gain 100% crit chance, but if she just autoattacks normally she can do a lot more than two shots in that time), but it will still be charging fast enough to make a difference. The idea would be to reward holding your fire for last hits instead of just spamming autoattacks, encouraging good play and synergising with her Hawkshot passive.

I like the idea of it only proccing off of champions. Still, she's a very successful ADC with a lot of utility. She has a lot to contribute to a team, besides her damage. Free vision, AOE slow, constant single target slow, and a global stun. She already has a really high winrate and I'm not sure if she's in need of buffs. Ashe is no hyper-carry, but she has her place. Still, I think her passive is kind of random and doesn't synergize well with her role as an ADC, who should be constantly attacking.
